title: Stephen Fry & the Gutenberg press
content:
A BBC documentary on the Gutenberg press, presented by Stephen Fry.

It's been all over the web, but I don't think it has cropped up here yet -- & it strikes me as something of interest for here. Go watch it on Youtube before it gets removed:

[http://www.youtube.com/view\_play\_list?p=A7B73F310275C05E](http://web.archive.org/web/20130216011538/http:/www.youtube.com/view_play_list?p=A7B73F310275C05E "http://www.youtube.com/view\_play\_list?p=A7B73F310275C05E")
author: serenac

comments.content:
You shouldn't underestimate Typophile!  
It was featured here before, and it was here first (well, almost): [Gutenberg documentary on BBC tv tonight](http://web.archive.org/web/20130216011538/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44217) :-)

Well at least I posted a link to the full Youtube playlist \*raises eyebrow\*

:)
Thank you for posting the YouTube link. Now those outside UK can see it, too. I missed the link in the original thread.

I am ecstatic to present you the links to the whole documentary that I just found. As you know the BBC doesn't give it up for free for non UK residents:

[http://ie.youtube.com/watch?v=SdD3DIa3adQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20130216011538/http:/ie.youtube.com/watch?v=SdD3DIa3adQ "http://ie.youtube.com/watch?v=SdD3DIa3adQ")

Enjoy!
